category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_retain_group_on_import
preference.preference_description: Determines group ownership of the import. When importing an object to a site where the original object's user and group are not defined, the replicated object's owning group is defined as the importing user's group.To preserve the replica's group ownership even when the original owning user is not defined locally (but the group is defined locally) set to TRUE. Valid Values: TRUE - Retains group ownership of the import when the owning group of the original object is define locally. FALSE - General rules of replica ownership applies.
